item.title: Learn Tidyverse: Pivot Functions
item.description: TL:DR : We will be using the pivot longer and pivot wider functions to change the shape of our dataframe.

item.title: Using RStudio
item.description: The purpose of this tutorial is to share some “hidden” tricks in RStudio that can improve coding efficiency and overall user experience.

item.title: Create Customized Shiny Dashboards: Without Knowing CSS!
item.description: Problem Recently, I was making a Shiny Dashboard that I wanted to look nice but I wasn’t satisfied with any of available themes and designs.
